active_incidents.title: Some Users are not receiving Emails from Slack.

notes.body: We are still working to resolve this issue, but have no further updates to share just yet. Thank you for bearing with us as we try to get a fix as quickly as possible.
We're still working to resolve this issue but have no new information to provide at this time. Thank you again for sticking with us while we work towards a fix.
We're still working to resolve this issue but have no new information to provide at this time. Thank you again for sticking with us while we work towards a fix.
We're still working on getting a fix for this issue but have no new information at this time. Thank you again for sticking with us while we work towards a fix.
We are still working to resolve this issue, but have no further updates to share just yet. Thank you for bearing with us as we try to get a fix as quickly as possible.
We’re still actively investigating this issue, but we don’t have any new information to share at this time. Thanks for sticking with us as we continue to work towards a fix.
We’re still investigating this issue, but we don’t have additional information just yet. We’ll be back in 30 minutes with another update.

Some users are currently not receiving emails from Slack, which can affect logging in and creating accounts.
We do apologise for the inconvenience, and will let you know as soon as we have any updates on this.
